definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: May I present Bell, assistante manager of G. E.
sentences.chinese: 请允许我介绍一下通用电器公司副经理贝尔。

sentences.english: The Deputy Manager shall keep record of such complaints and the redressal actions by the branch.
sentences.chinese: 副经理应将这类投诉及分行采取的措施记录在册。

sentences.english: EXAMPLE: Now I'm only an assistant manager at my company, but after a couple years I hope to be a veep.
sentences.chinese: 我在公司只是个副经理，但我希望过两年成为副总裁。

sentences.english: Who takes Javier's place as assistant manager of the coffee shop whenJavier is in Spain?
sentences.chinese: 哈韦尔在西班牙的时候，谁成了咖啡店的副经理呢？

sentences.english: Want to accept the offer of your company managing operation auditing assistant manager probationer now one duty.
sentences.chinese: 现欲应聘贵公司管理运作稽核副经理实习生一职。

sentences.english: Or Huang Tao speak to remind, "bore vice-president, your layer gushed."
sentences.chinese: 还是黄韬出言提醒，“孔副经理，你的楼层倒了。”

definition: assistant manager (in a large enterprise) (Tw)/(literary) to assist
to be put in charge of/to be responsible for/branched passage
head/director (of an organizational unit)/(police) commissioner/inspector-general/rank of local governor in Tang dynasty administration
